page.title: 14Childrens Games
page.content: {SQUARE}You play the game Square by making a square with jumpers.Be sure you have a football and as many people as you like can play.Pick two people to be on and the rest go in the square to sit.The two who are on have to kick the ball at those in the square,who try to defend themselves with feet or head.If the ball hits someone,the rest must throw him out of the square,and he is on.The last person left is the winner and picks two for the next go. {BUDGE}You need several people and some trees or posts.One person is{on}while the rest go to trees and are safe. If someone runs to your tree and yells BUDGE you have to run to another tree. The person who is on tries to catch a person who is running,if they do then that person is on.It is better if you have more people than trees,so people have to keep moving.
